patthana19.1:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana19.1:2.1_1: paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana19.1:2.1_2: abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Vipākābyākataṁ kiriyābyākataṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ
patthana19.1:2.1_3: paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo
patthana19.1:2.1_4: ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:3.1_0: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana19.1:3.1_1: paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo
patthana19.1:3.1_2: ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:4.1_0: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana19.1:4.1_1: paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo
patthana19.1:4.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā
patthana19.1:4.1_3: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā
patthana19.1:5.1_0: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
patthana19.1:5.1_1: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalañca
patthana19.1:5.1_2: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:6.1_0: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalañca
patthana19.1:6.1_1: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naakusalañca
patthana19.1:6.1_2: naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:7.1: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana19.1:8.1: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
patthana19.1:9.1: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
patthana19.1:10.1: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … dve.
patthana19.1:11.1: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana19.1:12.1: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana19.1:13.1: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.1:14.1: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
patthana19.1:15.1_0: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana19.1:15.1_1: paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā …pe… nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ
patthana19.1:16.1: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā …pe… nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.1:17.1: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā aṭṭhārasa …pe… napurejāte dvādasa …pe… nakamme nava …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge tīṇi …pe… navippayutte nava …pe… novigate cha.
patthana19.1:21.1_0: Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana19.1:21.1_1: paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato
patthana19.1:21.1_2: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā
patthana19.1:21.1_3: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana19.1:22.1: Naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:23.1: Naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana19.1:25.1: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paccayā … tīṇi. Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.1:26.1: Hetuyā chabbīsati, ārammaṇe terasa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate chabbīsati.
patthana19.1:29.1_0: Nakusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo abyākatassa
patthana19.1:29.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo dhammo akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa
patthana19.1:30.1: Naakusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:31.1: Naabyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana19.1:32.1: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:33.1: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana19.1:34.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.

patthana19.1:37.1: Naabyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana19.1:38.1_1: ca naabyākato ca dhammā akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nakusalo
patthana19.1:38.1_2: ca naabyākato ca dhammā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana19.1:40.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana19.1:41.1_0: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā tevīsa, anantare soḷasa …pe… sahajāte
patthana19.1:41.1_1: aṭṭhārasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye bāvīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte nava, pacchājāte
patthana19.1:41.1_2: cha, āsevane nava, kamme aṭṭhārasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre …pe… magge aṭṭhārasa, sampayutte
patthana19.1:41.1_3: nava, vippayutte dvādasa …pe… avigate dvāvīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
